senses.sense_definition: An old person with impaired intellect; a senile person; one in their dotage.

examples.text: The king was dismissed by his enemies as a weak <w>dotard</w>.
She refused to listen to the ramblings of the old <w>dotard</w>.

senses.sense_definition: One who dotes on another, showing excessive fondness.

examples.text: He became a complete <w>dotard</w> around his new puppy.
As a grandfather, he is a <w>dotard</w> who gives the children whatever they want.
